DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of a Group B Streptococcus vaccine at one dose in healthy non pregnant women and then in three different doses in healthy pregnant women.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity of a Group B Streptococcus Vaccine in Non Pregnant and Pregnant Women 18-40 Years of Age
DOC.criteria: Group 1 (Non Pregnant Women): Healthy females 1840 years of age inclusive. Group 2 (Healthy Pregnant Women): Healthy pregnant women 1840 yrs of age (between 2835 weeks gestation) Group 1 (Non Pregnant Women): Pregnant or nursing; History of severe allergy to previous vaccines; Known HIV positive Group 2 (Healthy Pregnant Women): History of severe allergy to previous vaccines; Known HIV positive
DOC.keyword: Prevention of group B streptococcus infection
